content: knitted drops hat in stockinette st with rib in lima or puna drops extra 0-1160 drops design pattern no li-057 yarn group b size s/m - l/xl head circumference approx 57/58 - 59/60 cm / 22½ /22 3/4 materials drops lima from garnstudio 100 g for all sizes in color no 0519 dark gray or use drops puna from garnstudio 100 g for all sizes in colour no 05 dark grey drops double pointed needles and circular needle 40 cm /16 size 4 mm/us 6 - or size needed to get 21 sts x 28 row in stockinette st = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 drops circular needle 40 cm / 16 size 3 5 mm/us 4 for rib worked in the round on circular needle switch to double pointed needles when needed
